2. City Hall

City Hall
=========

![image_access_800](https://www.elizabethnj.org/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4298)

The City government of Elizabeth, New Jersey is made up of a [Mayor](https://www.elizabethnj.org/271/Our-Mayor) and a [City Council](https://www.elizabethnj.org/215/City-Council). The City's Mayor J. Christian Bollwage, a lifelong resident of Elizabeth, is currently serving his sixth term as Mayor. The Elizabeth City Council is made up of nine members.

9

1

1

2

1. #### [City Council](https://www.elizabethnj.org/215/City-Council)

   Take a look at City Council information for the City of Elizabeth.
2. #### [Administration](https://www.elizabethnj.org/544/Administration)

   The Department of Administration consists of the office of Business Administrator and seven (7) divisions. Employee Benefits, Information Technology, Personnel, Public Information, Purchasing, Rent Control, and Weights and Measures.
3. #### [Recreation](https://www.elizabethnj.org/517/Recreation)

   Welcome to the Recreation Department Website.
4. #### [Health and Human Services](https://www.elizabethnj.org/546/Health-and-Human-Services)

   The Department of Health and Human Services consists of seven (7) divisions, Animal Control, Health Division, Health and Housing, Human Services, Reentry, Transportation, and Vital Statistics. Under Human Services there are six (6) subdivision, Elizabeth Municipal Alliance Committee, City of Elizabeth Rental Assistance Program, Office on Aging, Office of Public Health, Office on Youth, and Public Health Nursing.
5. #### [Public Works](https://www.elizabethnj.org/548/Public-Works)

   The Department of Public Works is comprised of four (4) divisions. Engineering and Administration, Maintenance and Construction, Public Buildings, Markets and Docks, and Recycling.
6. #### [Finance](https://www.elizabethnj.org/393/Finance)

   The Department of Finance is comprised of three (3) divisions. Accounts and Control, Tax Assessor, and Tax Collector.
7. #### [Planning & Community Development](https://www.elizabethnj.org/420/Planning-Community-Development)

   The Department of Planning & Community Development is comprised of seven (7) divisions. Bureau of Construction, Central Licensing, Economic Development, Elizabeth Home Improvement Program, Planning Board s, Relocation, and Zoning Board of Adjustment.
8. #### [Law](https://www.elizabethnj.org/547/Law)
9. #### [Agenda & Minutes](https://www.elizabethnj.org/AgendaCenter)

   View the Agenda & Minutes
10. #### [City Ordinances](https://www.elizabethnj.org/272/City-Ordinances)

    View the City of Elizabeth City Ordinances.
11. #### [Staff Directory](https://www.elizabethnj.org/Directory.aspx)
12. #### [Zoning Map](https://www.elizabethnj.org/221/Zoning-Map)
13. #### [City Council Resolutions](https://www.elizabethnj.org/790/City-Council-Resolutions)
